Lynda Barksby 077875624405 lynda@holistichealthhubderbyshire.co.uk Cemetery Chapel Staveley Cemetery Inkersall Road Chesterfield S43 3JL Monday - 10.00 – 11.00 / 13.30 – 14.30 / 16.30 – 17.30 Tuesday 10.00 – 11.00 / 13.30 – 14.30 Wednesday 11.00 – 12.00 / 13.30 – 14.30 Thursday 10.00 – 11.00 / 13.30 – 14.30 Friday 10.00 – 11.00 / 13.30 – 14.30 / 16.30 – 17.30 Saturday 10.00 – 11.00 Sunday (last of month 11.00 – 12.00) Through the CIC company, The Power of We, Holistic Health Hub Derbyshire offers free classes to the Chesterfield and surrounding community (aerial silks, aerial yoga, hoop, chair yoga, mat yoga, children’s circus). The snug will promote community connection through chat, jigsaws, reading material, and craft options. All activities / social time will include a free drink and light food options (cake / biscuits)
